price: 31. Loba: Bozela, ngai mpe na bino mpe tozali kozela.
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
